pullrequest.title: Add ArrangePlugin to arrange models for tasks

content.raw:
I made a fix in 6063d56b36b7; use the following to test:
~~~
diff -r 6063d56b36b7 worlds/arat.world
--- a/worlds/arat.world	Wed Sep 24 13:28:29 2014 -0700
+++ b/worlds/arat.world	Wed Sep 24 13:28:36 2014 -0700
@@ -46,6 +46,7 @@
     </include>
 
     <plugin name="arrange_plugin" filename="libArrangePlugin.so">
+      <model_name>fake_model</model_name>
       <model_name>cricket_ball</model_name>
       <model_name>wood_block_10_2_1cm</model_name>
       <model_name>wood_cube_10cm</model_name>
~~~
content.html:
I made a fix in 6063d56b36b7; use the following to test:

diff -r 6063d56b36b7 worlds/arat.world
--- a/worlds/arat.world Wed Sep 24 13:28:29 2014 -0700
+++ b/worlds/arat.world Wed Sep 24 13:28:36 2014 -0700
@@ -46,6 +46,7 @@
     </include>

     <plugin name="arrange_plugin" filename="libArrangePlugin.so">
+      <model_name>fake_model</model_name>
       <model_name>cricket_ball</model_name>
       <model_name>wood_block_10_2_1cm</model_name>
       <model_name>wood_cube_10cm</model_name>
